name: Turbo Mob
description:
GAME LINK: http://wtfgamejam.github.io/TurboMob/index.html

WTF Game Jam 2016 - TurboMob

Little prototype of what Rocket League might have been like in 1992.

What's working?

  • Car control
  • Goal Scoring
  • Turbo (A button)
  • Spin (X button)

What's not?

There's no menus, timer or win state. It just goes on forever.

What's Next?

  • Menus
  • Game Timer
  • Keyboard Control

Requirements

Requires two controllers.
